thread.title: The Dream Vacation for One
thread.title_full: The Dream Vacation for One - WSJ

author: Ellen Byron
title: The Dream Vacation for One
text:
Getaways now include getting away from your family and friends.
Amid the rise of activity-specific trips, busy work schedules and mobile devices that make it easy to keep in touch, more vacationers are choosing to go alone, leaving significant others and friends behind.
“People are definitely saying, ‘You know what, honey, I don’t care if you want to go—I’m going,’” says Gregg Marston, president of VBT Bicycling and Walking... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
